title: [HOLD for payment 2023-11-27] [$500] Able to set welcome message for threads created from policy room
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to a policy room like #admins
2. Send a message in the room.
3. Create a thread from the message.
4. Click on the report header.
5. Click on settings.

Expected result: We should not be able to see the welcome message options because that should only be available for policy rooms

Actual result: None
